name: PixelWorld Online
description:
This is a MMORPG that I have been working on!!

It is still being developed but if you want you can still test it out.

Currently I am self-hosting the server so it may only be Running on the weekdays (9:00 am to 2:00 pm: Eastern Daylight Time) 

I am working on fixing that, but you can still download the game now and try on the weekdays.

Features:

1. Auto Updater

2. Online

3. Anyone can connect to it!!
